name: Ball Road: Fun Snake Rise Run
name_original: Ball Road: Fun Snake Rise Run
description:
Ball Road is a challenging and fun game where all you have to do is stay away from the slithering ball line!

HOW TO PLAY?
Touch the screen and drag your finger to move the color balls. Keep the balls away from the snake line for as long as you can and try not to touch the wall as you progress along the road.

MAIN FEATURES:
◉ Unique and challenging gamplay.
◉ Perfect for stress release.
◉ Many challenging stages to complete.
◉ Suitable for kids of all ages.

Get this FREE game right now and have FUN!
